abstract: David Allen Critic's Notebook discusses motivation behind, and results of, cellist Matt Haimovitz's impromptu series of concerts in public spaces around Columbia University.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Haimovitz, an adventurous cellist, took his Miller Theater playlist to the cafeteria, gym and study hall. Here’s what happened.

headline.main: Matt Haimovitz and Bach, Colonizing Columbia’s Campus
headline.print_headline: What Happens When Bach Visits the Cafeteria

snippet: Mr. Haimovitz, an adventurous cellist, took his Miller Theater playlist to the cafeteria, gym and study hall. Here’s what happened.
